hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #10# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of #the hero#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Twinrova# holds...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
